usage.cn: 梦的最深处，只有微笑不累。
usage.eng: Dream most deep place, only then the smile is not tired.

usage.cn: 当你能飞的时候就不要放弃飞。当你能梦的时候就不要放弃梦。当你能爱的时候就不要放弃爱。
usage.eng: Don't give up when you are able to fly,to dream and to love.

usage.cn: 如果我们有勇气去追求，我们所有的梦想都可以成为现实。 ——Walt Disney（华特迪士尼）
usage.eng: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

usage.cn: 未来属于那些相信梦想之美好的人
usage.eng: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
